mapper.select: SELECT target_decompose_details_id, target_decompose_id, employee_id, area_id, department_id, product_id, region_id, industry_id, principal_employee_id, amount_target, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM target_decompose_details WHERE target_decompose_details_id = #{targetDecomposeDetailsId} and delete_flag = 0

SELECT tdd.target_decompose_details_id, tdd.target_decompose_id, tdd.employee_id, tdd.area_id, a.area_name, td.decompose_target , tdd.department_id, tdd.product_id, p.product_name, tdd.region_id, tdd.industry_id, tdd.principal_employee_id, IFNULL(tdd.amount_target, 0) AS amount_target, tdd.delete_flag, tdd.create_by, tdd.create_time, tdd.update_by, tdd.update_time FROM target_decompose_details tdd left join target_decompose td on td.target_decompose_id = tdd .target_decompose_id and td.delete_flag =0 left join product p on p.product_id = tdd.product_id and p.delete_flag =0 left join area a on a.area_id = tdd.area_id and a.delete_flag =0 WHERE tdd.target_decompose_id = #{targetDecomposeId} and tdd.delete_flag = 0

SELECT tdd.target_decompose_details_id, tdd.target_decompose_id, tdd.employee_id, tdd.area_id, a.area_name, td.decompose_target , tdd.department_id, tdd.product_id, p.product_name, tdd.region_id, tdd.industry_id, tdd.principal_employee_id, IFNULL(tdd.amount_target, 0) AS amount_target, tdd.delete_flag, tdd.create_by, tdd.create_time, tdd.update_by, tdd.update_time FROM target_decompose_details tdd left join target_decompose td on td.target_decompose_id = tdd .target_decompose_id and td.delete_flag =0 left join product p on p.product_id = tdd.product_id and p.delete_flag =0 left join area a on a.area_id = tdd.area_id and a.delete_flag =0 WHERE tdd.target_decompose_id = #{targetDecomposeId} and tdd.delete_flag = 0
AND tdd.principal_employee_id=#{employeeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO target_decompose_details (target_decompose_id, employee_id, area_id, department_id, product_id, region_id, industry_id, principal_employee_id, amount_target, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) VALUES (#{targetDecomposeDetails.targetDecomposeId}, #{targetDecomposeDetails.employeeId}, #{targetDecomposeDetails.areaId}, #{targetDecomposeDetails.departmentId}, #{targetDecomposeDetails.productId}, #{targetDecomposeDetails.regionId}, #{targetDecomposeDetails.industryId}, #{targetDecomposeDetails.principalEmployeeId}, #{targetDecomposeDetails.amountTarget}, #{targetDecomposeDetails.deleteFlag}, #{targetDecomposeDetails.createBy}, #{targetDecomposeDetails.createTime}, #{targetDecomposeDetails.updateBy}, #{targetDecomposeDetails.updateTime})
mapper.update:
UPDATE target_decompose_details SET delete_flag= 1, update_by=#{updateBy}, update_time=#{updateTime} WHERE target_decompose_details_id IN
#{item}
